short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Archie.AI is a chat bot for Google Analytics. You can talk to Archie about your data in plain English.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Talk to Google Analytics from your chrome browser without having to go to Google Analytics  website. 

Instantly access traffic, sales or conversion data through Archie.AI Chrome Extension. 
No need to sift through countless webpages to get to the data you want.

Ask Archie in plain English and get the answers instantly.

-----------------------------

Archie's Top 10 Answered Questions:
Â» What was my traffic in the last 7 days?
Â» Give me a weekly briefing.
Â» Please predict my next week's traffic.
Â» How many visitors did I get from Facebook in the last 24 hours?
Â» Where did I get most of my visitors in the last 24 hours?
Â» How much traffic did I get from Google in the last 7 days?
Â» Give me a daily briefing.
Â» How many conversions did I get in the last 30 days? 
Â» How much revenue did I make in the last 30 days? 
Â» What kind of device did most of my traffic use?

Full List of Questions: https://www.archie.ai/ask-me

-----------------------------

Additional Features: 
Â» Cut through Google Analytics w/ free, weekly emails.
Â» Talk to Google Analytics w/ Amazon Alexa enabled devices.
Â» Talk to Google Analytics w/ Google Assistant enabled devices.
Â» Web App to effortlessly compare conversion funnels using Google Analytics data.

Please ensure you are logged into the same Google account on Chrome Browser and Archie.AI Chatbot.
